description: Make this chunky beef pie recipe when you need some extra warmth. It's a hearty, mouth-watering meal that's perfect on a chilly night.
name: Traditional Chunky Pepper Beef Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200째C. Place a baking tray in oven. Fill pastry bases with meat mixture. Brush edges with water and top with pastry lids, pressing edges together using a fork to seal and trim excess. Brush pie tops with egg and make a steam hole using the point of a knife. Place pies onto hot baking tray and bake for 25 minutes or until pastry is golden and puffed. Serve immediately.
